title: Art Elk Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Japanese, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little cafe on the 2nd floor offering food and drinks as well hosts international language and friendship events. Air-conditioned with view of the shopping streets below. Advertises a 'vegetarian tourists welcome' sign. Has 4 items on its vegetarian menu, written in both English and Japanese. Vegans specify and staff will assist.
